data.Question: In which country is the data hosted?
data.Commentaire: France

data.Question: What level of encryption is used to protect the data?
data.Commentaire: AES-256 for storage, TLS 1.3 for communications

data.Question: Is your solution GDPR compliant?
data.Commentaire: GDPR certification under renewal

data.Question: What is the guaranteed availability of your service?
data.Commentaire: 99.5% SLA excluding scheduled maintenance

data.Question: How do you manage data backups?
data.Commentaire: Daily backups with 30-day retention, geographic replication

data.Question: Do you have a business continuity plan?
data.Commentaire: BCP tested annually, 4-hour RTO

data.Question: Who has access to client data?
data.Commentaire: Access limited to authorized support and development teams

data.Question: How do you manage user authentication?
data.Commentaire: Mandatory multi-factor authentication, SSO integration possible

data.Question: Do you perform regular security testing?
data.Commentaire: Bi-annual penetration testing by external firm

data.Question: How are security patches managed?
data.Commentaire: Automatic deployment of critical patches within 48h

data.Question: Is your infrastructure certified?
data.Commentaire: ISO 27001 and SOC 2 Type II certification

data.Question: How do you ensure action traceability?
data.Commentaire: Complete audit logs with 12-month retention

data.Question: Do you provide an API for integration?
data.Commentaire: Documented REST API with OAuth 2.0 authentication

data.Question: How do you handle scaling?
data.Commentaire: Load-based auto-scaling, microservices architecture

data.Question: What is your incident management process?
data.Commentaire: 24/7 on-call, automatic escalation based on criticality

data.Question: How do you ensure data confidentiality?
data.Commentaire: End-to-end encryption, HSM-managed keys

data.Question: Do you have a dedicated security team?
data.Commentaire: 5-person cybersecurity team, certified CISO

data.Question: How do you manage data deletion?
data.Commentaire: Secure deletion per NIST 800-88, destruction certificate

data.Question: Does your solution support data export?
data.Commentaire: Complete export in standardized formats (JSON, XML, CSV)

data.Question: How do you ensure team training?
data.Commentaire: Mandatory security training, annual updates
